item.title: Migrate a project from 0.3.0 to 0.4.0
item.description:
From bennob...@gmail.com on May 07, 2014 10:13:54
Up to now i was using mapsforge release 0.3.0 in my project.
The new release 0.4.0 seems to be not compatible at all with the 0.3.0.
Can you please update the wiki with some hints like GettingStarted with release 0.4.0, i.e. how the Overlays have to be used ... and how to migrate a project from 0.3.0 to 0.4.0.
Greetings Benno
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=496

item.contents:
From wish7code on May 12, 2014 05:18:04
A step-by-step guide (or a simple checklist) would indeed be very helpful...

From devemu...@gmail.com on July 27, 2014 02:42:22
Please use the mailing list for such questions. http://groups.google.com/group/mapsforge-dev The issue tracker is for documenting bugs and feature requests.
